snippet.title: Black Mesa: Blue Shift | Focal Point Release Date Teaser
snippet.description:
Black Mesa: Blue Shift is receiving a new chapter once again! Chapter 5: Focal Point will be out on И̸̢̺̤̱̐̾̌̓͜͝o̷̻̻͚̬̥͛͌͠͠͠v̶̱̪̮̮̖̏͋̈́̊̕ɘ̴̢͙̗̠̬̃̔̽̂͘ḿ̸̙͉͉̬̤̅̎̊͝ḓ̸̤̟̦̮̀̑̾̆̑ɘ̸̨̧̦͎̻́̈́͒͂͒ɿ̴̝̰̹̙͕͋́̀̈́͠ ̵̦̙̜̺͍̆̅̊̓̉Ɩ̸̡̫̱̪̣́͂͆́̋٢̶̯̲̙̦̜̏̀̎̚͘,̵̺͚͈̮͙̀̈́͗̈́̕ ̶͈͓̠̫̳͆͌̿̌́ς̷̦͉͉͍͙̿̾̈́̉̋0̸̡̬͕̙̹̂̈̈͠͝ς̴͈̹̯̭̙̃̓̽͆̒X̶͕͉̙̥̠͋̂͋̾̈!

Black Mesa: Blue Shift is being developed by HECU Collective
_________________

LINKS
Our Discord:
https://discord.gg/uhdTxP5Cuw
Black Mesa: Blue Shift on ModDB:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-blue-shift-remake
Black Mesa: Blue Shift in Steam Workshop:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2424633574

SUPPORT US
HECU Collective Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/Hecu_collective
Your support really matters to us.

#remake #blueshift #blackmesa #halflife
